body.p: I have the honor herewith to enclose the Petition of Jos. Melchor signed by Eleven of the Jury who tried the case and amongst others by His Honor Mayor Crawford. --
I defended the case for Mr. Melchor and Know his is a proper one for Executive clemency; did I not sincerely believe it I would trouble your Excellency. --
I trust, Sir, that you will feel justified in granting my clients prayer. --

I have the honor to be
Sir
Yr friend & fellow citizen
A. B. Fontaine

His Excy. B. Magoffin
Frankfort
Ky.
